text: JoJo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers celebrated their one - year anniversary on Friday, May 12. The Bachelorette alums, who met and fell in love on the season 12 finale of the popular ABC reality series, posted touching tributes to mark the milestone occasion. Set to the romantic tune of Brett Eldredge ‘ s “ Drunk on Your Love, ” Fletcher, 26, posted a collection of sweet photos highlighting the couple ’ s love story. “ One year with you @ jrodgers11. I love this crazy, beautiful, ridiculous life we have together, ” she wrote, alongside the compilation, which features snaps of the pair from that fateful first meeting to the present. One year with you @ jrodgers11 I love this crazy, beautiful, ridiculous life we have together A post shared by JoJ
